name: Snare
description: You weave a 5-foot circle of rope on the ground to create a magical trap. The rope is consumed when you cast the spell. The trap is nearly invisible and lasts for the duration. When a Small, Medium, or Large creature enters the circle, it must succeed on a Dexterity saving throw or be hoisted upside down 3 feet above the ground and restrained until the spell ends. A restrained creature can use an action to make a Dexterity saving throw, ending the effect on a success. A creature adjacent to the tether can use an action to make a Dexterity check against your spell save DC to disarm the snare, ending the spell on a success.

components.materialDescription: 25 feet of rope, which the spell consumes

effects.description: Trap is nearly invisible (Perception or Investigation vs. spell save DC). A creature adjacent to the tether can use an action to make a Dexterity check against your spell save DC to disarm the snare, ending the spell on a success.
